Author: akkartik
Content: And it's great too. As soon as I can see a list of my own comments it becomes relatively easy to check recent ones for responses, and automatic notification becomes less important. It's interesting how these features interact.

Author: ecuzzillo
Content:
Seems to me that we have a hole. http://news.ycombinator.com/comments?id=29

Speaking of which, I do not entirely understand what a dead link is. I told it to show dead links, and links other than this one that were dead have been reasonable, so I'm confused. Normally, I think of dead links as ones that don't work anymore, but the dead ones here certainly do work.

Author: jwecker
Content: I live on Maui and even though the Maui High Performance Computing Center is here plus the Haleakala Observatory- I've met only 3 or 4 geeks my whole time here, and no tech entrepreneurs.  Of course, I can't complain.  I mean, I live on Maui.
